Articles.Content:
Have they changed the way in which airlocks are made for 20?

Have tried this article, and followed it word for word, and I get the obstructed issue.

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Adding_Airlocks_and_Ladders_to_Parts

So has something been changed?

Subnote, I have made airlocks before, and with much success, so I know how they are done.
